patthana15.27:1.1: Sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.27:2.1: Sappaccayaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana15.27:3.1: Sappaccayaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naappaccayo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ sappaccayasadisaṁ.)
